name: Spider Dungeon
description:
This is my second university game, made in a week once again, inspired by games such as house of the dead and time crysis! 

You have been sent into the deepest dungeon of hell for commiting several counts of petty theft and tax evasion. You, unlike many others have been given a chance at redemption. However, in order to achieve this, you must fight through the spider dungeon, in which several trials and enemies await you, all trying to achieve one goal, to prevent you from escaping. How will you fare in the deepest trial of hell? The Spider Dungeon?

Controls -

Move Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

Used Assets -

ScribbleToad hand model - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hand-low-poly-d6c802a74a174c8c805deb20186d1877

Hope you enjoy the demo!
